item.title: Asian shares mostly rise after last week's Wall Street rallies
item.description: Global shares are trading mixed as markets look ahead to a possible U.S. Federal Reserve interest rate cut later this week

item.title: Australian bank ANZ agrees to pay record $160M penalty for corporate misconduct
item.description: One of Australia's largest banks has agreed to pay a record $160 million in penalties for corporate misconduct

item.title: Workers commenting on Kirk's death learn the limits of free speech in and out of their jobs

item.title: FAA seeks $3.1M in fines from Boeing over safety violations, midair panel blowout
item.description: Proposed penalty is for safety violations from September 2023 to February 2024.
